attributes.action: Get doctor’s surgery’s open as they were pre pandemic
attributes.additional_details: This system isn’t working. Sometimes impossible to even get an appointment for triage. Some people having to wait weeks to even get a telephone triage. Dentists, beauticians, tattooist are all open, and in close contact with patients. G.p surgeries have everything in place already to keep safe.
attributes.background: Insist that g.ps open for appointments without the need to triage first.
